name: Do not Play Depressed
description:
Do not play depressed if a university project created in my second year of Game Development. we were a team of six, with no experience whatsoever in unity.

This project isn't finished, but since I don't have the assets or models anymore I could only try to improve the coding of the game (since I was its lead programmer). 

With that said, the game is narrated in Portuguese, and it has no available subtitles so far. It was created under the theme of "Inutil" (useless). And so our game is quite literally a useless game, with pointless questions. This has graphic representations of gore and moral choices, be warned.

The only thing I've done in this project was strictly the coding, I take no credit for art or narrative or even voice acting.
